Websites.name: Jobsearch site
Websites.description: A site created in a team of five with a pre given api to view different jobs on the site.
Websites.largeDescription: The fist group project with IO academy was a good opportunity to learn about programming in a group with things such as pair programming and using git in a group. The site was built using a react frontend and a pregiven api for use in the backend.

Websites.name: Blog site
Websites.description: A site created in a team of five to share blog posts, features include a user registration / login as well as liking and disliking posts.
Websites.largeDescription: During the second team project with IO Academy we created a blogging site to work on backend coding. This backend was coded in php with a basic html and tailwind frontend.

Websites.name: Hotel booking site
Websites.description: A site created in a team of five designed for hospital staff to use when managing rooms in a hotel.
Websites.largeDescription: For this third group project we had a pre given react based front end. The project was focused on using laravel to create our own database to create our backend for the website.
